titocc.compiler.elements

Class IntegerLiteralExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
      • titocc.compiler.elements.Expression
        • titocc.compiler.elements.IntegerLiteralExpression

  • public class IntegerLiteralExpression
extends Expression
    Integer literal expression.

    EBNF definition:
    INTEGER_LITERAL_EXPRESSION = INTEGER_LITERAL

        rawValue - integer digits as a string
        suffix - suffix
        line - starting line number of the integer literal expression

      • compile

        public void compile(Assembler asm,
           Scope scope,
           Registers regs)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    SyntaxException
        Description copied from class: Expression
        Generates assembly code for the expression. Value of the expression is returned in the first available register.
        Specified by:
        compile in class Expression
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for code generation
        scope - scope in which the expression is evaluated
        regs - available registers; must have at least one active register and the first one is used for return value
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws
        SyntaxException - if expression contains an error

        Evaluates the expression at compile time if possible.

      • parse

        public static IntegerLiteralExpression parse(TokenStream tokens)
        Attempts to parse an integer literal expression from token stream. If parsing fails the stream is reset to its initial position.
        Parameters:
        tokens - source token stream
        Returns:
        Expression object or null if tokens don't form a valid expression
